name: Guitar
description: A 1980 Les Paul guitar. Minimal wear. Used by famous musician in concert tour. Signed on lower right side.

name: Toyota 4Runner
description: 2012 Toyota 4Runner. 140k miles. New tires, headlights, and reverse sensor. Has been in one accident but only recieved cosmetic damage.

name: MSI Laptop
description: Lenovo gaming laptop. Has an intel i7 cpu and an NVIDIA 2070 super m gpu. Runs great. Recently disassembled back plate and cleaned dust out of the air ducts.

name: Astros A50 Headphones
description: Astro branded headphones. Lightly used. Compatible with PC/MAC, XBOX Series X|S, but not with PS5. Wireless headset with Flip-to-Mute mic, 3D audio ready, Dolby Audio and more.

name: Saxophone
description: Saxophone that has been used by my son while in school. Purchased in 2007 and used until 2011. Properly maintained and keypads have been replaced recently. Does not come with mouthpiece.

name: Nokia Cell Phone
description: Old phone that still works perfectly fine. Been through the trials and tribulations that no other phone would survive. Finally upgrading my phone to a Razr, heard they are good.
